Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

void const *

The basic type void const * describes a constant (unchangeable) C/C++ untyped memory pointer.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AILFREECB, AIL_DLS_load_memory, AIL_MIDI_to_XMI, AIL_WAV_file_fss_write, AIL_WAV_file_write, AIL_WAV_info, AIL_allocate_file_sample, AIL_compress_DLS, AIL_create_wave_synthesizer, AIL_decompress_ASI, AIL_extract_DLS, AIL_file_fss_attrib_write, AIL_file_fss_write, AIL_file_type, AIL_file_write, AIL_filter_DLS_with_XMI, AIL_find_DLS, AIL_init_sequence, AIL_input_callback, AIL_install_DIG_driver_image, AIL_install_MDI_driver_image, AIL_list_DLS, AIL_list_MIDI, AIL_load_sample_buffer, AIL_mem_free_lock, AIL_merge_DLS_with_XMI, AIL_quick_load_mem, AIL_send_sysex_message, AIL_set_3D_provider_preference, AIL_set_3D_sample_file, AIL_set_3D_sample_preference, AIL_set_filter_DLS_preference, AIL_set_filter_preference, AIL_set_filter_sample_preference, AIL_set_filter_stream_preference, AIL_set_named_sample_file, AIL_set_sample_address, AIL_set_sample_file, AIL_vmm_lock, AIL_vmm_lock_range, AIL_vmm_unlock, AIL_vmm_unlock_range
